author: stevel
msg: add added stuff to our friend the WHATSNEW. Yes, I am in a deployment week :)

author: stevel
msg: tightened the policy on response codes; 404 is now recognised as invalid, along with any of the >400 codes. But for people that really dont want that, there is an errorsBeginAt attribute that you can move up or down the line

author: stevel
msg: extra helpful debug information when trying to track down obscure things
